verbose_text: The antiviral action for the active extracts belonging to A. gracilistylus cortex and T. arvensis fructus was explained to occur through inducing cyclooxygenase-2 (COX-2) expression via the activation of extracellular signal related kinase (ERK) and p38 or ERK alone.
evidence: expression via the activation of extracellular signal-related kinase (ERK) and p38 or ERK
